    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/112477</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/112477</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Drži kot pribito - igra</string>
            <string language="en">Talk show \"Drži kot pribito\" - play</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gespräch Erscheinen \"Dr?i kot pribito \" - 
Spiel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pribito de kot de \"Dr?i d'exposition d'entretien
\" - jeu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pribito do kot do \"Dr?i da mostra da conversa \"
- jogo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pribito del kot di \"Dr?i di esposizione di 
colloquio \" - gioco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η συζήτηση εμφανίζει \"Dr?i kot pribito \" -
παιχνίδι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pribito del kot del \"Dr?i de la demostración de
la charla \" - juego</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Napisala sem igro, aktualno ob volitvah, v kateri so lahko nastopali vsi učenci v razredu. Z igro sem želela opozoriti na zdrav način življenja.</string>
            <string language="en">Play that represents talk show between political parties arguing about health care.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">igra</string>
            <string language="en">play</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">dramatizacija</string>
            <string language="en">dramatization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zdravje</string>
            <string language="en">health</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">politika</string>
            <string language="en">politics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spielen Sie, das Gespräch Erscheinen zwischen 
den politischen Parteien darstellt, die über Gesundheitspflege 
argumentieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jouez qui représente l'exposition d'entretien 
entre les parties politiques argumentant au sujet de la santé.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogue que representa a mostra da conversa entre 
os partidos políticos que discutem sobre o cuidado de saúde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gioc che rappresenta l'esposizione di colloquio 
fra i partiti politici che discutono la sanità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παίξτε που αντιπροσωπεύει τη συζήτηση εμφανίζει 
μεταξύ των πολιτικών κομμάτων που υποστηρίζουν για την 
υγειονομική περίθαλψη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juegue que representa la demostración de la 
charla entre los partidos políticos que discuten sobre cuidado 
médico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">dramatization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesundheit</string>
          </keyword>
